description.value:
A Tool designed to reduce the time required to extract a Progenoid Gland from an often fallen Astartes. Mounted under the wrist by Apothacaries. Takes 1 Round to remove one gland, meaning two rounds for full recovery. Can also be used as a Melee Weapon, although not designed for it (1d10+2 R, Pen 10), doesn't add SB to damage.

Effect: Initiated

Notes: 8 R
